article.description: A.J. Spencer scored 16 points off the bench as Long Beach State beat Division II BYU-Hawaii in an exhibition game Saturday night.
article.headline: Long Beach State beats Div. II BYU-Hawaii 91-57
article.linkText: Long Beach State beats Div. II BYU-Hawaii 91-57
article.story: LONG BEACH, Calif. -- A.J. Spencer scored 16 points off the bench as Long Beach State beat Division II BYU-Hawaii in an exhibition game Saturday night. Spencer did it with 7-of-10 shooting from the field for the 49ers. Roschon Prince added another 16 points, Nick Faust had 14 points, Noah Blackwell had 13 and Justin Bibbins 11. Branford Jones led on the boards with 13 rebounds. The team hit 47.7 percent from the field and sank 82.1 percent of their free throws. Long Beach State went 22-4 to start on its way to a 47-26 lead at the break. In the second half, a dunk by Mason Riggins midway sparked a 7-0 run that extended LBSU's lead to 74-44 with 8:46 to play and they cruised to the win. Justin Yamzon scored 20 points for the Seasiders who averaged just 27.9 percent from the field.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
